content: The app has been great, but I'm suddenly seeing little videos in place of the thumbnail photos, and it doesn't look good. It adds clutter; and it hinders the shopper. I want to see a picture of each item, so I can locate what I want... Instead I'm shown graphics. I know you want to make things look dynamic, but I don't need that -- I need to see the products. A video is unnecessary up front... The video is only useful if I'm considering the item more closely. Up front, we just need a photo.

Made me Uninstall it due to the constant re-download of songs,Ads all the time when driving. Unsafe and having to organize the music in Playlist over and over. Plus there is no way to delete multiple songs at once from a Playlist or album from what I experienced. Select, delete, repeat. Bad reception areas r reason for download songs. But have to re-download so often. Ended up deleting app and canceling subscription.

It was a great experience at first but since November or so I have been charged twice a month for prime membership, I guess they charge you double for the "free shipping" I have been attempting to contact customer service in the app, which the app lags alot and it will automatically take me back to the home page. It has improved slightly more and is doing less than that. But I'm not sure if you are supposed to be charged twice each month for Amazon prime.

Update: It's been a week and still no resolution. This app is all AI. There isn't any customer service when you have an issue. It's a prompted survey with vague multiple choice answers. The last two orders I made with Amazon, both had issues. The first time my credit card took care of the problem. This time it's, Latest Beauty, a 3rd party vendor who as of yet hasn't made things right. I'll find somewhere else to shop now.

Please remove the moving pictures of products. You guys changed the app so that now each product moves in its own tiny video as I scroll and this makes it impossible for me to process information or do anything. It short circuits my brain and I have to just close the app and not purchase anything. It's insensitive of you to auto play product movements. Please, please give an option to turn this OFF. Thank you.

Worse shopping experience.since the last update. No log out option, the app immediately opens without asking for a password, if your phone is stolen anyone can go on a shopping spread with your card. Amazon made it impossible to change your default account and they've hidden all settings that you need to manage your profile. It uses a webpage interface, slow, unresponsive and sincerely a lazy way of providing a shopping app.

This app is trash. They allow you to buy with no problem, but if you try and view your orders, it absolutely never works. I was trying to do some returns, and I couldn't bring up the order to be scanned. It was very inconvenient. It's very rude to think that there is no problem when taking your money but viewing orders or returning them are not allowed. Make sure you print out all the return slips before spending the time to drive to ups for no reason

I would have given you 4 stars at least but now you are lucky to get 2! I never had a problem with the app till recently. Now all the text is in Spanish! I have to convert to English to understand anything I am searching for or ordering. This is highly annoying! There is no contact or chat within the app for assistance! When you search FAQ, you get no where in regards to this issue. I live in the USA. I am English speaking. So this issue is outrageous!

2/14/23 Edited to add: App keeps deleting itself from my Secure Folder since the Android 13 update a couple of weeks ago. When using chat, the keyboard covers the area where the words are being typed! I had to use my laptop to have a conversation with customer service. Reorganized menus & buttons made things a lot more difficult to navigate.

Looks like I'm not alone here. Only issue is Amazon. So many ship from china item in my prime list. Delivery dates change after order is placed and had several items never arrive. Customer support made we wait almost an extra week for a refund on an item that showed delivered with a picture by FedEx and showed wrong state in details. Amazon said it was delayed, but couldn't give me what tracking they were looking at. Customer service has disappeared completely. Trying Walmart now

Latest update messed up the screen in the orders tracking section. When I look to see delivery progress, the tracking status window now stays on the screen and covers over 3/4s of the map. All I can see now is a thin section of th map and if I want to track the how many stops away progress I have to fiddle around to find the icon and try to reposition it. It's like looking through a pinhole. The part that says how many stops left is covered and I can only see one or two words at a time

Mostly ok but they keep changing where the features are located in the app (sometimes left corner, now lower right corner under several different tabs, to find recently purchased orders). Frustrating when you have to keep learning the app because they keep changing where features are placed. Make it easier to find recently purchased orders!

Not a problem with the app. DEFINITELY a problem with Amazon. The last couple items I've ordered were exorbitantly late, one I'm still waiting on. It arrived at a destination yesterday and didn't move at all today. I pay for prime for quick and efficient delivery of items and that is not what I've been getting. Pretty close to canceling my membership and buying from my local area or just start using E-bay

Recently, I can't add anything to my cart (which is empty). I choose my item options (color, size, etc), but the price is shown as a range (ex: $20-$25) and when I tap the yellow Add to Cart button, nothing happens. I have no issues with the same items when I go to the Amazon website.

I get locked out of my account randomly because of "suspicious activity" when trying to make a purchase, the app is slow and doesn't load, and the support for getting your account back is terrible. I tried loading money onto it and I accidentally used a debit card I didn't want to use and it gave me no chance to cancel the pending transfer nor confirmation that I wanted to do so. I had to lock my debit card just so it wouldn't go through and that made them lock my account. Absolutely terribleApp

The amazon delivery day is SO annoying. I have it disabled within the app and when I place any order, including one click buys, it defaults to a date a week out even though the listing says free delivery tomorrow for instance. Then I have to completely cancel and replace the order, which includes clicking through multiple screens to finally get my prime delivery. Also the videos of products that automatically play when scrolling make it incredibly difficult to view the products

Everything was great until it wasn't. My wish list disappeared, support said it would be back in 48 hrs. I read here about reinstalling app might fix it. Now I can't sign in because it's sending a confirmation text to my home number (I'm in Mexico with a local SIM). I'm not going to incurr a ridiculous roaming charge (Canadian - Telus) just to find out if it worked or not. All this app incurred nonsense can wait until I get home.

Get with the times Amazon, implement "dark mode"! This may seem a petty reason to leave a 1-star review, but it has been years now, and I don't know how else to draw attention to this. There is no discernable reason why this premiere shopping platform hasn't integrated a feature that has become a standard option for nearly every device it is installed on. I am irritated every time I use this app since it sticks out like a sore thumb next to the uniform darkness of my other apps. Fine otherwise.

In Australia I won't buy from Amazon again! Buying from store in Australia gives a lot of flexibility and majority of store have online store too where I will get a year to 2 years of warranty which in Amazon, I haven't seen an option when something goes wrong after 3 months of return window. Secondly, to message and communicate with the seller is not a straight forward. One can buy things very easy, but communication and message section is hidden somewhere tricky to reach.

I'm so frustrated by the filters on amazon! What is the point of having them if they don't work? For example, I searched for 'plastic shoe boxes' on eBay & that's what came up: I could then filter for size, material, colour, free postage, UK seller, price range, etc. I searched on Amazon for plastic shoe boxes & got tiny boxes for beads & the only filter option was brand & above or below £15. So I bought on ebay! Amazon's filters are as bad as they were a decade ago - no progression at all!

It's ok. A little lagging in speed. But they should make a section for items that you saved to lists that are now on sale. I always prefer to purchase items on sale instead of full price. I'm a sale and bargin shopper. So I'll wait for something to go on sale, but will likely miss the discounted price because I don't live on the Amazon app. Then I miss out on a purchase and the seller misses out on a sale. And no, I don't care about the lightening deals. I care more about things on my lists.

I'm downgrading my review because I'm frustrated that Amazon deletes items from my cart with no way to retrieve them from my smart phone or if I accidently delete them. Also, it's maddening to try and find all of my saved items. That's improved somewhat, but the app still sometimes freezes during a search. These problems seem weird for a company that wants you to buy their stuff. I can understand if they have to remove items if you have too many, but you should be able to retrieve them.

I've cancelled my membership, and am now simply trying to get the items I've already paid for. Amazon has become unreliable and they aren't keeping their end of the 2 day shipping any longer. Since Christmas I've received items late consistently. Also I've received two of my orders not packaged properly. And both items came broken into pieces. AFTER waiting a ridiculous amount of time to get them. I'm done. Not the same service they use to provide.

This app sucks. Amazon is great for finding basically anything and getting it, but this mobile app is terrible. It's extremely laggy and slow, first of all. Every time I try to add an item to my gift registry, it says 'try again' over and over while I'm clicking the button many times, and then all of a sudden it says 'item already on registry' and gives me the option to view my registry. App sucks. Fix your damn app, Bezos!

Worst update ever! Everything used to be easy to find and use, for a long time now. I shop on Amazon daily. This is a horrible configuration! If I could roll back the update on my phone, I would. What the hell made you think this was a good layout? 13 February 2023. Another craptastic update! I can no longer 'add to cart' from my phone. Just fix the bugs and stop trying to 'improve' something that worked just fine before.

I spoke with a customer service representative about a shipping charge to return an item that was used & wasn't correct. The app lags badly & it seems like there aren't all the items we used to be able to shop for. I had the customer service phone number in my contacts & they went into my contacts list, my call list & removed their customer service number and name without my permission. I have Amazon app set with no permissions & blocked notifications. I told them it was illegal to do that.

I tried having an item delivered to my apartment but ended up having to drive across town to get it myself, despite what Amazon said. The last 4 days it was supposedly out for delivery, when in reality UPS dropped it off at a Michael's across town, and Amazon never let me know. I had to go onto the UPS website to figure out what happened, and if I hadn't I would have never known and my order would have been sent back. I don't understand why Amazon couldn't update me so I know to pick it up.

Things with Amazon have gone significantly downhill. I purchased a car seat/ stroller ($550) from Amazon. It was fulfilled via Amazon, but was a scam and I received a camera lens cover instead. I contacted them immediately and after sending photos of the packaging and item, was authorized for a refund. I sent the item back and it was received 2/10. It's now 2/28 and I still have no refund. I contacted customer service multiple times but they tell me I have to wait until April to get a refund!

App works fine. Amazon does not. It once was a reliable service. Now, they promise same day delivery and make sure to charge you for it in your yearly membership, but it usually doesn't show up til the next day. Some deliveries take months.. Projected delivery times frequently change. If Amazon retained a steady, reliable, and well-paid workforce that wasn't overworked instead of their high turnover rate, they would likely be more reliable.

Amazon sucks anymore. The prime fee went up and is a waste of money because the items you ordered arrive the same time as standard because they only count it when it is shipped and not when order was placed anymore. Also 3rd party sellers they do not cover. So why have them on there? I just took a money loss because of it. Not good customer service with that

I like the Amazon and use it frequently. However, when I forgot my password, I had to jump through hoops just to reset my PW. And then the app locked me out and provided s message that I would have to call the support line. What a joke!! who had time to play phone games. This was several months ago, and I am STILL NOT ABLE to use the app bc I'm still locked out. And the system will not let me create another account or log on using my husband's info. I am beyond frustrated!! What the heck JB?

Good but problems since updating. Now I can't take screenshots of my orders because of the "security policy" when that wasn't a problem before. It also now asks every time for my address and payment method and because of that I can't screenshot my purchases for my records anymore. I can literally take a screenshot of my address and card in Settings and Wallet, so why is it all of a sudden an issue in My Cart? Also for the person who asked, no, Amazon isn't supposed to charge you twice for Prime.

And new problem with the app and "my lists". Now i can't acrually click on anything. I can see the stuff but what good is that if i can't purchase it? I'm trying to go through "my lists" for some christmas shopping but the update won't let me scroll all the way to the bottom of the page. It says I have to load more items but when I press it, it says an error occurred and to try later. Every single time.

Just started receiving confirmation emails in Spanish language. It's always been English and I have not changed any user preferences. Today I received an email in Spanish. Read online this is an ongoing problem. FIX IT ALREADY AMAZON! It ain't hard! P.S. I am writing this here because amazon went the extra mile to make sure nobody can email them for support. I don't have time to waste fixing Amazon's problems or helping their technically challenged IT team. Let me know when you have fixed it.

Product ads have gotten so bad in the app that finding what I'm actually trying to buy is almost impossible. I've found myself going into actual stores lately to find name brand products. Three or four years ago, Amazon's shopping experience was awesome. Now it's unbearable. I WILL look elsewhere for products before Amazon now.

Since the most recent updates, this app does not work like it used to. I still get the notifications on my phone when an item is 10 stops away or when someone from the family needs approval to the account after signing in. However, when I click on the notification, all it does is take me to the Amazon main page and then I can't approve the family member access or see my order. I used to be able to. Please fix!!!

Amazon used to have the best customer service but no longer does. Items ordered increasingly run late or don't arrive at all, forcing customers to contact Amazon. The chat feature is laborious and oftentimes frustrating. Items that require being returned cause customers to jump through more hoops. As Amazon's popularity have increased, it's customer service seem to have decreased.

Not happy with their service the last few months. Christmas gifts were delayed 4 almost a month. Missed Christmas. And so far this year EVERY birthday (4 of them) have been late or have been damaged and returned to sender the day I purchase it. Causing to have to not only WAIT 3-5 days for the refund. But also reorder the items. 3 items for 3 birthdays have been repeatedly marked undeliverable the day I bought them 3 TIMES! Amazon told me I cannot reorder. I need to go to the store for my gifts.

More Than Satisfied!! I've never had any issues with the app or general website thru all the years I've been using Amazon & their services. I love the convenience of the app at my fingertips. I'm always ordering something for work, myself & family/friends. I enjoy browsing, as well. I really like the "help" option & "message center" - anytime I've had a question. Someone is there on the other end to assist me immediately.

Lately all of my Amazon apps have been buggy. They kick me out everytime I open a window or page. I called about this to their yech support and the guy told me i had to do a factory reset. I did that, and went through the hassle of having to add everything back on etc. It worked for about a week and now back to the bugginess. Every time I open my orders or subscriptions etc it kicks me out. Sane on music snd Kindle. Uts very annoying.

Absolutely horrible service these last few months. Nothing arrives on time. Why pay for prime if you have to wait weeks for your order. I have canceled more orders due to this issue in the last month then the entirety of 5 years shopping through Amazon. I just cancelled my prime. I would rather order through another site and be told up front delivery will take weeks, rather than wait to find out after the fact. Very greedy Amazon. You're failing to provide the prime benefits being paid for.

Updates do seem to be getting better. But, please consider adding somwhere on the HOME screen- to disable seeing suggestions, previous purchases, auto subs bc opts. to shut these off/clear/cache search, not helping. Helpful is the previously viewed item.. only within a SET time frame of shopping, of that or of a frequent search. Also having the ability to add a frequently searched list, of a broader category in detail would be helpful too!

Amazon has been terrible since 2020. 1st complaint is, I would make an order of like 4 items all in 1 order, paid for all at once. But then Amazon would split my order up & charge my card 4 separate times for the same order. Then, my bank would charge me for every purchase. My 2nd complaint is, some how my delivery address got changed after I confirmed the delivery address & have screenshots of it. I had to contact UPS multiple times 2 fix each package.

Very easy to shop and access menus. However, THE most annoying thing masks the experience. When scrolling, the app would register taps every time you lift your finger. You end up opening random items and having to back up every time.

Account was compromised. Received email saying no transactions would be processed. However They let an order for 200$ go through. They said I would receive a refund. Have my screenshots. Yet my money was not returned. I'm on a fixed income and they just gave my money away . Definitely will not be buying from them anytime soon. Don't trust my card info with them any longer.

This app literally *never* freaking works. Either it won't show you your cart, or it won't show you your orders (error screen both times), or it won't let you switch between accounts. Among many other things. Every new update makes it worse. We're talking Facebook levels of fail. So annoying.

New app tries to ask friends if I should buy something when I share links, even if I have the slider option set not to ask. Sometimes I just want to send a product link, I'm never asking people what they think. It's annoying to have to change the text from every single link because Amazon isn't connected with it's customers and doesn't know what I use the app for.

I have never had to wait 7 days after the seller receives the return item. Untill now, they have Amazon store Credit they want to force me to use and I will not. I used to be able to return the item and hours after UPS scanned it... I had my refund confirmation. Now they say it's the bank processing time that causes this. Shady companies like this don't last long in the digital era. I can't wait for someone to come out with a competitive product, I'm canceling this account ASAP.

Frequently crashing . Recently attempted to purchase an item from my cart. At every step, received "something went wrong" message. While I love photos of dogs, it was a frustrating experience. Occurred even after I restarted my phone and cleaned the cashe. Had to place the order via the website on my computer.

Okay as a shopping service, although its only been getting worse. Probably the biggest criminal against privacy. ALL your information and usage data gets sold off. They even want my license ID now. Don't really see how its so important in order to ship my 6 pack of socks...... also the search algorithm has become nearly unusable. It near strictly shows you Amazon bargain brand and sponsor. The back button skips you to the beginning half the time. Considering canceling my prime if it continues

Amazon does not stand behind their word. You do not get free easy returns with your membership. It's actually extremely hard and more of a headache then anything. They charge a lot for returns. Their customer service is extremely incompetent and rude. Definitely canceling my membership with them.

You still won't let me do reviews! Noone is messing with my reviews except you guys! Please give my review ability back. Also, subscriptions for meat products don't give prices sometimes until its too late to skip them. U could price gouge if u wanted, and I'd be sol. Not saying u would, but if the price was way high, I would not have a choice. Not cool at all. I can't afford to gamble like that. Please fix this issue. Thanks.

Horrible change to the app, can't see any previous order, wish list is gone, items that say they are $99 cost twice as much by the time thr exchange and shipping adds up. What happened to the good days when it was already in CAD and you didn't get destroyed in shipping when you pay for Prime already. Not pleased

Amazon isn't supposed to charge your debit card until your items ship out. I cancelled my items because I needed the money for other things but Amazon already charged my card and when I called them they didn't make it right they just said I had to wait 7-10 business days to get my money returned. It was the same day I cancelled the items as I purchased them. The items wasn't scheduled to be shipped out for another 5 days either so they charged me way early. Not going to shop Amazon anymore

Lost a customer for good. I had two packages this month that claimed they were delivered, when I call they claim it's a mistake and that my package would be delivered next ... days. NOTHING. I was refunded the first time for THEIR mistake. The second time for their mistake, I have to pay? No refund, no product, no worries. So much other companies that would have compensated me for their issues. Without having to pay a monthly fee. 10 years of membership. DONE.

Over the past 2 weeks, I have been having issues with my packages being delivered to the incorrect address. I have contacted Amazon customer service to report this however it seems that they are just willing to replace the items. That would be fine it the replacement was sent to the correct address on file. I had a bunch of stuff delivered yesterday clearly to the wrong house and had to report that too. I have other packages coming some of which I can't wait for a replacement. Not happy!

Poor app. Gets worse with every update. Just poorly designed and not user friendly. Regularly fails to load your orders, just saying "something went wrong on our end". Just irritating. Particularly irritating is the app's continued inability to display your orders, the page just flashes like it is loading them, but never does.

Horrible new outlay to List & Registry. Went onto amazon earlier to purchase an item from one of my Idea lists (not shopping/private list), but it has completely changed!! Instead of having products that i added neatly displayed in twos next to eachother with price (or no price if out of stock) and the option to remove item in one click (x at top of product box), it is a rolling list, products underneath eachother and to make it worse, the products are no longer clickable!! Raging!!

Annoying new update. Ever since it updated recently the application drags and drags! On top of that, when I click on my orders it stays in a blank white page with the loading bar on top and just does the Uh-Oh error page. I've restarted phone, closed app, esc and it does same thing every time.

Extremely bad practice with the handling of prime accounts auto transactions. I discovered that I had been paying for prime for 6 months, there was no prime membership because it was automatically logging into Amazon.jp based on my location. The prime membership was activated in Amazon.au. Once locating it the cancellation process requires multiple confirmations so I didn't actually successfully cancel and it was charged again the next month. I have now paid 7 months of prime on a useless accoun

Wow, changed where all the settings are. I can't find my wallet nor any other setting really. I had an issue logging in once. For some reason Amazon demanded a code from a purchase I had to find on either my bank or credit card statement. Since I couldn't log on, I didn't know which account was my latest purchase and from when to even look. The CSR in India was useless. He couldn't help at all and only demanded that code. I cancelled prime. Y'all can f\/©K yourselves

The app is fine this is more of an Amazon complaint. Amazon keeps raising the price of prime while simultaneously providing poorer services. I'm getting really tired of my packages not being delivered on time or sometimes at all. Then asked to wait 2 days before I can file a complaint and receive a refund for a package that says delivered with a picture of someone else's front door. I'm very very close to canceling my prime membership. The executives don't need more money stop

Back to the middle ages. This used to be such a user friendly apps. I used to order books straight from my email to the apps using my android. Three minutes total to order a book. Now, I can only get audible and no longer surf for ebooks. Now, I have to use my laptop to open amazon emails, click on the link, wait for the download of suggested readings,and then slowly dawdle through the suggested books. This is the latest version of amazon apps for android! Useless. Am off to look at alternative

Amazon is amazing and awful at the same time. A couple specific things I wanted to say, they have basically no way to file a complaint also, they need to better communicate with USPS. Whenever my packages are sent by UPS or FedEx, they're always on time, when it's USPS it's always at least 1 day late. It's kind of frustrating when it's something you really need and to be able to know when it's actually coming can be really important.

I appreciate the accessibility to countless products on the web. The one thing that does irritate me is how long it takes for alot of purchase to go through my account. I've had instances where my payment is immediately taking out of my account and then other times when it takes weeks if not months to go through and it pisses me off.

Is usable but has two really annoying behaviors: The 1st one is that who ever designed their "filter" doesn't understand the concept, say your original list has 100 items, want to prune it down? Ok set a filter on customer review... Now you have 456 items?!?! And 356+ of them don't match your original search criteria! Second is that it is very VPN unfriendly and will pertend it can't get internet until you turn the VPN off!!

I honestly have mixed feelings on using this App & Amazon as a whole. Their prices are all over the place & they push you to buy from Amazon. Prices aren't usually the cheapest, with browsers now able to show lower prices & local availability, you can see the cost differences. They move delivery dates based on your other orders so they can save on shipping, so don't be surprised when it arrives days after you needed it. Delivery with UPS is properly delivered however USPS puts it out front.

Was good until recently when, while scrolling thru products when searching, they begin playing thumb nail videos of what you are trying to see as soon as it gets to the middle of the screen. Makes it impossible to scan through products quickly. The amount of wasted time and frustration isn't worth it. Horrible user experience.

Searching items is much worse. 50%+ items showing up isn't what I typed in looking for. Waste of time scrolling trying to weed out the items I'm actually trying to search through. If you enter something, only that should show up. Nothing else. Some things don't even have the words in the description. Frustrating and annoying.

Over half of my prime orders arrive late. Only certain refunds are issued on returns when items are received by Amazon, others are subject to a 30 day wait period before the refund is issued. The app doesn't tell you which items are subject to the 30 day hold. You have to contact customer service to figure out which returns are being held and customer service is horrible!

It would be nice if there was a way to quickly see everything you have purchased with "pay in 5" instead of having to scroll through your whole purchase history to find the items. As if you need to review the payment date or anything it's a lot of hassle to find which items you got through that. Apart from that, it's just like amazon's Web page.

The app works fine for making purchases, but everything else has issues. App constantly crashes when trying to move items in list, sort in searches is almost useless, you see an item for one price, click on it to see more and it's magically increased in price. Not a good app, but it's somewhat functional.

The app is really slow, especially when selecting different variants of a product on the product page. Example: selecing different colors of the product takes almost a minute to load the new images and details When I check out my cart and select payment and address changes, I have to cancel and reload the app between 2-3 times every order, because it freezes and gets stuck in infinite load.

I get message, amazon prime membership on pause till I update billing method, message continues, updates cannot be done in the app. I don't even recal a time that a billing issued occured. No emails or texts related to billing issue. Just when I go in the app. Reinstalled app a few times to try and resolve issue, no luck

I've been an Amazon customer for a long time. I dont usually review things unless I have something serious to say about them. I have to say I think this is one of the least user-friendly apps out there. Buy one thing and you get flooded with ads for related items with no way to turn them off. And if you do manage to get to customer service in under 20 minutes, you won't get a lot of help with navigating the beaurocracy of this app. Stick to the browser. Same benefits, fewer headaches.

Amazon is the BEST online shopping source! You can purchase almost anything that is for sale in today's world for a somewhat fair price. They offer a premium subscription service costing over $130 a year that includes shipping on the stuff you buy, Prime TV, photo storage, and a couple other things. If you buy everything that you otherwise would through your local stores, it is a value especially if your disabled like me.

Difficult to sign out of this app. I followed the instructions but there's no way I can figure out how to sign out and I do not want to stay signed in for security reasons. Navigating around this app is sort of frustrating and time-consuming. Using a browser to access Amazon is much more simplified and not so busy ..... Amazon needs to do something about their app with too much stuff to navigate around. I am uninstalling this app because it is too frustrating to work with.

It feels like I barely get anything from them that's electronically working by them. I bought 2 PS4 controllers and they hardly worked. One lasted for about a month before giving it stopped working and the other controller about 2 weeks before it stopped working. I've had multiple cancelled items from them along with with multiple lost orders. Starting to think Amazon is only robbing people out of their money

Absolutely useless. Multiple delivers I've been sent get delivered to any house in the area. Amazon won't tell me where. So it's a guessing game. So when I get sent stuff. Other ppl just get free goods. And with no way of finding them and Amazon being extremely unhelpful . They don't care about the order or where it's gone. So I stopped using them all together... AVOID

This app is useless. Trying to pick up my order from a locker and the app keeps telling me to turn on location services, which are on and the app has permission to access location. There is no other way to access the locker apart from using the app so I can't collect my order and it will have to be returned for a refund. I would give minus stars if that was possible.

I have not received any orders in over a month. The day items are to arrive I get an email saying that the item is undeliverable. Amazon customer service said items were damaged and refund will be issued. Why are they refunding instead of replacing items? Items ordered on Amazon card took just long enough on return/refund for me to still have to pay interest. Done with Amazon.

Amazon changed their 2-day shipping policy, so now you can't get anything within 2 days despite paying for Prime. Ebay has had faster, and better shipping times than Amazon lately. What is the point for Prime when I don't like their original shows and have Spotify for music, and now can't even get 2-day shipping.

Love shopping on Amazon. It's so convenient, but lately, using the mobile app has become a problem. I can no longer search through my orders from previous years, and it seems that when I do a search for something particular, I get results for everything except for what I'm looking for.

New misleading "from" prices. It's impossible to find things while browsing because every item has a price listed as "from $2.45" which is actually just the price of a small accessory option while the actual item pictured is $42.95.
